title: Remember the Maine Recipe
full_text:
Remember the Maine Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
2 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
2 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
rye whiskey
3/4
ounce
sweet vermouth
2
teaspoons
Cherry Heering liqueur
1/2
teaspoon
absinthe
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with cracked ice; stir well for 20-30 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
Special equipment
Mixing glass, cocktail strainer
Whiskey
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
